lead_paragraph: In a filing in federal bankrupcty court, the New York State Attorney General’s office raises several questions about a proposed reorganization of the defunct opera company.
snippet: In a filing in federal bankrupcty court, the New York State Attorney General’s office raises several questions about a proposed reorganization of the defunct opera company.

headline.main: State Challenges Plan to Revive City Opera
headline.print_headline: State Challenges Plan to Revive City Opera

abstract: New York State Attorney General challenges plan by NYCO Renaissance to revive defunct New York City Opera; objects to proposed $300,000 settlement for rival group to withdraw its bid for opera and questions whether reorganized company could be financially viable.
